name: TeamUp - Event/Venue Management System
desc: A microservices based platform for managing and booking sports venues and events. It connects users in real time with secure authentication, bookings, payments and map-based discovery using a modular service-oriented architecture.

name: SmartMedia Analyst - Real-Time AI-Powered Media Monitoring Platform
desc: A microservices-based platform that ingests live media streams (YouTube, radio, podcasts) and uses advanced AI to transcribe, analyze, and control content in real-time. Built with FastAPI, Docker, PostgreSQL, and Hugging Face Transformers.

name: Distributed Redis Cache System
desc: A distributed Redis caching system with automatic failover and data replication. Features include consistent hashing, ZooKeeper coordination, gRPC communication, and Prometheus/Grafana monitoring. Built with Node.js and Docker for high availability and scalability.

name: DevSync - Collaborative Code Environment
desc: A real-time collaborative coding platform with integrated execution capabilities, enabling multiple users to code, chat, and test solutions simultaneously. Built with MERN stack and Socket.IO.

name: Cadenza - Real-time Music Collaboration
desc: Cadenza is a real-time music collaboration app built with React, Node.js, Tone.js, and Magenta.js. Compose, explore, and share music using a piano roll, AI-generated melodies, and live feedbackâ€”all powered by modern web and AI technologies.

name: Mario Platform Game
desc: A Mario-style platformer game with multiple themed levels, enemy AI, and coin collection mechanics. Built with Kaboom.js and JavaScript, featuring responsive controls and modular architecture.

name: Smart Recipe Generator
desc: A MERN stack app powered by Cohere's LLM that generates personalized recipes based on available ingredients, dietary preferences, kitchen equipment, and suggests smart substitutions.

name: Distributed Messaging System
desc: Kubernetes distributed messaging system with sequential message passing through 4 server pods via TCP sockets and DNS discovery. Python-based implementation showcasing StatefulSets, headless services, and pod-to-pod communication.

name: Language Agnostic Visualization Web Application
desc: A unified platform for creating data visualizations using either Python or R directly in your browser. Write and execute code with real-time rendering of static, interactive, and 3D plots without switching environments.
